import React, { useState } from 'react' import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Signup() { const [data,setData]=useState({user:'ameera',password:'123'}); const navigator = useNavigate(); async function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); const url="http://localhost:8000/sign-up" await axios.post(url,data); navigator("/login") } return ( <>
Sign up!
) } export default Signup
